data.title: Promise on Christmas translation
data.meta_description: Last one for tonight/this morning. It's Christmas come early~ Song title: Promise on Christmas Performed by: Mizuki Nana Lyrics: Hiwatari Sutsuka Composition & Arrangement: Nakayama Hayato Album: GREAT ACTIVITY (2007)   Promise on Christmas Performed by: 水樹　奈々 作詞：ヒワタリスツカ 作曲＆編曲：山中　隼人 Promise on Christmas (translation) Performed by: Mizuki Nana Lyrics: Hiwatari Sutsuka Composition & Arrangement: Nakayama Hayato 初めて君と過ごす今日は　特別なクリスマス・タイム…
data.text:
Today that I’m experiencing with you for the first time is a special Christmas time

A dazzling holy night when the streets sparkle brightly

I’m sorry I don’t notice every day

Sorry for being a selfish child, unable to see past your kindness

With my gratefulness, today is

I want to tell you, “Thank you,” for you

I swear to you on this night when angels descend

So I want you to be beside me and make my heart clench

Merry Christmas

Writing “I like you” on the misted glass, I immediately erased it

Embarrassed, you smile as you hum Christmas carols

I wanna feel your warmth every day

Snuggling, gripping your hand and walking

Wrapped in your hand’s warmth that reaches my heart

For being by my side, “Thank you,” for you

Because you’re here I become stronger

And I swear to become even stronger

To protect your all

Merry Christmas

On Christmas night I give you alone my love

The Church’s bells of love are blessing us
